title: VK API JSON Schema - responses
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - responses

count.description: Total count of found lookalike requests

upload_url.description: To upload an image, generate POST-request to upload_url with a file in photo field. Then call appWidgets.saveAppImage method
To upload an image, generate POST-request to upload_url with a file in photo field. Then call appWidgets.saveAppImage method

privacy_policy.description: URL of the app's privacy policy

profiles.description: List of friends profiles, used only when return_friends=true

groups.description: List of groups, used only when extended=true

is_allowed.description: Whether notifications are allowed for current user from concrete app or not

sid.description: Parameter needed to grant access by code

base_undefined_response.description: Response schema is not defined yet

can_add_topics.description: Information whether current user can add topic
Information whether current user can add topic

friend_deleted.description: Returns 1 if friend has been deleted

out_request_deleted.description: Returns 1 if out request has been canceled

in_request_deleted.description: Returns 1 if incoming request has been declined

suggestion_deleted.description: Returns 1 if suggestion has been declined

enabled.description: Information whether catalog is enabled for current user
Information whether catalog is enabled for current user

next_from.description: Encoded string for a next page
Encoded string for a next page
Encoded string for a next page

minutes.description: Estimated time of answer (for status = answer_mark)

bots_capabilities.description: By enabling bot abilities, you can send users messages with a customized keyboard attached as well as use other promotional abilities

bots_start_button.description: If this setting is enabled, users will see a Start button when they start a chat with your community for the first time

bots_add_to_chat.description: If this setting is enabled then users can add your community to a chat

obscene_filter.description: Information whether the obscene filter is enabled

obscene_stopwords.description: Information whether the stop words filter is enabled

toxic_filter.description: Information whether the toxic filter is enabled

disable_replies_from_groups.description: Information whether the replies from groups is disabled

member.description: Information whether user is a member of the group

invitation.description: Information whether user has been invited to the group

can_invite.description: Information whether user can be invited

can_recall.description: Information whether user's invite to the group can be recalled

request.description: Information whether user has sent request to the group

liked_by_author.description: Author of post if he liked the comment

liked_by_group.description: Group where post is present if they liked the comment

liked.description: Information whether user liked the object

copied.description: Information whether user reposted the object

profiles.description: List of users, available only if extended=true exists in query params

groups.description: List of groups, available only if extended=true exists in query params

next_from.description: Offset for using in next query

peer_ids.description: List of successfully added peer ids

last_deleted_id.description: Id of the last message, that was deleted

assets.description: Base reactions assets to display by default

override_assets.description: Extended reactions assets for special occasions, user allowed to switch to the base version

reaction_ids.description: Enabled reactions for current account. You can use reactions only from this array or already present on target message

last_viewed.description: Time when user has been checked notifications last time

more.description: Information whether next page is presented

saved.description: Returns 1 if profile photo is saved

owner_id.description: Owner ID of created pretty card

card_id.description: Card ID of created pretty card

owner_id.description: Owner ID of deleted pretty card

card_id.description: Card ID of deleted pretty card

owner_id.description: Owner ID of edited pretty card

card_id.description: Card ID of edited pretty card

chunks_count.description: Total count of chunks to load

user_ids.description: Users ID who can to see story.
Users ID who can to see story.

upload_result.description: A string hash that is used in the stories.save method

stem.description: part of a word responsible for its lexical meaning

current_level_count.description: Count of replies of current level

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post

groups_can_post.description: Information whether groups can comment the post

current_level_count.description: Count of replies of current level

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post

groups_can_post.description: Information whether groups can comment the post

owner_id.description: Owner ID of created video object

video_id.description: Video ID of created video object

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post

groups_can_post.description: Information whether groups can comment the post

post_author_id.description: Author id of the comment's post

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post

groups_can_post.description: Information whether groups can comment the post

current_level_count.description: Count of replies of current level

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post

groups_can_post.description: Information whether groups can comment the post

can_post.description: Information whether current user can comment the post
